abstract: Amaranth Advisors, the hedge fund that failed last year after losing $6.5 billion, sued JPMorgan Chase, accusing the bank of sabotaging its efforts to stave off collapse.
lead_paragraph: Amaranth Advisors, the hedge fund that failed last year after losing $6.5 billion, sued JPMorgan Chase, accusing the bank of sabotaging its efforts to stave off collapse.

headline.main: Amaranth Sues JPMorgan Over Fund’s Collapse
